name: Magic Brew Cafe
description:
A visual novel / cooking / recipe game made for the My First Game Jam of Summer 2022! This took two grueling weeks but it's done now! 

In this game, you're a witch who gets a job at a cafe, and you befriend a customer.

It's pretty short. there are two possible endings!

my devlog for it is here game jam devlog - Magic Brew Cafe!! - My First Game Jam: Summer 2022 community - itch.io !

--

also note that there is a bug where if you click on the cauldron without filling up the cauldron completely/following a recipe, the game will crash. (so if you're trying to find the Dangerous Brew, you have to fill the cauldron completely!)
